Not including the native Celo token

attributes.documentation:
@title Holds a whitelist of the ERC20+ tokens that can be used to pay for gas
Not including the native Celo token
attributes.name: FeeCurrencyWhitelist

attributes.documentation:
@notice Sets initialized == true on implementation contracts
@param test Set to true to skip implementation initialization
@notice Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.
attributes.name: initialize

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add a token to the whitelist
@param tokenAddress The address of the token to add.
attributes.name: addToken
getWhitelist
whitelist
getVersionNumber
removeToken

addToken(address).details: Add a token to the whitelist

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to add.

params.test: Set to true to skip implementation initialization

getVersionNumber().return: Storage version of the contract.Major version of the contract.Minor version of the contract.Patch version of the contract.

getWhitelist().details: Once Celo becomes an L2, use the FeeCurrencyDirectory contract instead.
getWhitelist().return: a list of all tokens enabled as gas fee currency.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.index: The index of the token in the whitelist array.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

whitelist(uint256).details: Once Celo becomes an L2, use the FeeCurrencyDirectory contract instead.
whitelist(uint256).return: Address of a token in the whitelist.

devdoc.title: Holds a whitelist of the ERC20+ tokens that can be used to pay for gas Not including the native Celo token

methods.constructor: Sets initialized == true on implementation contracts

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

initialize().notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

removeToken(address,uint256).notice: Removes a Mento token as enabled fee token. Tokens added with addToken should be removed with this function.

whitelist(uint256).notice: Gets the whitelist item at the specified index.
